items.title: The Cure guitarist Perry Bamonte dies aged 65
items.description: The band says Perry Bamonte passed away "after a short illness at home over Christmas".

items.title: Draper to miss Australian Open with arm injury
items.description: British number one Jack Draper will not play in next month's Australian Open because of an ongoing arm injury.

items.title: Family of man missing at sea pay tribute
items.description: The family of Matthew Upham have named him as one of the swimmers who went missing on Christmas Day.

items.title: US judge blocks detention of British social media campaigner
items.description: Imran Ahmed was among five people accused of seeking to "coerce" US firms into censoring free speech.

items.title: Israel recognises Somaliland as independent state, Netanyahu says
items.description: The decision has been condemned by Somalia, Egypt, Turkey and Djibouti, who call it a dangerous precedent.
